location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 66: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell forwards copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Persia, Tehran. The letters (nos. 56-63) are not included here, but they do appear as items earlier in the file (see f.16, ff.17-21, ff.22-23, ff.24-25, ff.26-27, ff.28-30, f.31 and f.32).
